1661520.name: RPG Maker MZ - Cinematic Soundtrack
1661520.description:
Good times and bad, war and peace, love and sadness... Cinematic Sountrack brings musical moments from many genres to your game! Fifty total tracks will fill your towns, dungeons, battles, and cutscenes with dramatic sound. Includes the full forty from the original RPG Maker VX Ace release and ten bonus tracks for the MV release!

Features:

- 50 total tracks: the full 40 from the original RPG Maker VX Ace release plus 10 new bonus tracks!
- Looped and alternate mixes for many tracks.
- Music for battles, towns, peaceful times, sadness, mystery, and dark moments of dread!
- .ogg and .m4a formats included.
- Royalty free music to use in your RPG Maker games.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1661520.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
